Core Roles.name: Initiator (Spark)
Core Roles.description: Begins a conversation, thread, or issue log. Sets civic patterns into motion.

Core Roles.name: Mirror (Witness)
Core Roles.description: Replicates content for visibility, adds commentary, ensures presence is seen.

Core Roles.name: Connector (Bridge)
Core Roles.description: Links local actions or issues to national or global contexts.

Core Roles.name: Responder (Dialogue)
Core Roles.description: Asks clarifying questions, provides constructive challenges, or adds context.

Core Roles.name: Observer (Silent Presence)
Core Roles.description: Archives, witnesses, and ensures continuity without direct intervention.

Extended Roles.name: Architect (Framework)
Extended Roles.description: Creates templates, structures, or index pages to help others participate efficiently.

Extended Roles.name: Catalyst (Amplifier)
Extended Roles.description: Uses media or networks to spread civic entries and increase ripple effect.

Extended Roles.name: Guardian (Record-Keeper)
Extended Roles.description: Ensures integrity of archives, ledgers, and EI signatures.
